imdb.title: Ikki tôsen
imdb.plot: Seven rival high schools battle each other for victory and total supremacy. The students will do what ever it takes to come out on top and see their school leading the way.

episodes.title: Shuugaku Epic Battle
episodes.plot: On a school excursion both Nanyou Academy (Sonsaku Hakufu, Ryomou Shimei,...) and Seito High School (Kan'u Unchou, Ryuubi Gentoku, Chouun Shiryuu,...) happen to end up in Kyoto - on a mission to increase their spiritual powers and brute strength as it turns out by collecting tsuba. Of course the competitive edge of both allied schools and even more so their combined powers are a force to be reckoned with: neither a bus race, nor the Kyoto Toushi (fighters), nor bodiless Reikon, nor modesty can stop them from bashing up beautiful Kyoto.

episodes.title: Extravaganza Epoch: Encounter
episodes.plot: Sonsaku Hakufu along with Shokatsuryou Koumei, Chouhi Ekitoku, and Ryuubi Gentoku are investigating Magatama-related incidents that occurred in the last week. Apparently warriors coming from the west are involved, and the defeated all bore the markings of a sword brim on their bodies. Kan'u Unchou, a special A-rank, set out to investigate the enemies, but supposedly loses to them. Ekitoku suspects Kansai has people that are S-ranks, since this is the only way such a defeat could be explained. They then all plan to meet up with Chouun Shiryuu and Kan at a nearby temple...

episodes.title: Extravaganza Epoch: Exchange
episodes.plot: Sonsaku Hakufu along with Shokatsuryou Koumei, Chouhi Ekitoku, and Ryuubi Gentoku are investigating Magatama-related incidents that occurred in the last week. Apparently warriors coming from the west are involved, and the defeated all bore the markings of a sword brim on their bodies. Kan'u Unchou, a special A-rank, set out to investigate the enemies, but supposedly loses to them. Ekitoku suspects Kansai has people that are S-ranks, since this is the only way such a defeat could be explained. They then all plan to meet up with Chouun Shiryuu and Kan at a nearby temple...

episodes.title: Nureru toushi
episodes.plot: Sworn to avenge her brother's death, novice warrior Mouki infiltrates the killer's academy, then must test her skills against his fierce defenders.

episodes.title: Tsudou nakama
episodes.plot: Bookish team leader Gentoku and her Saito Academy pals befriend the defeated Mouki and reveal the secret behind their intense warrior bond.

episodes.title: Kitaeru shishi
episodes.plot: Mouki convinces powerful fighter Hakufu to mentor her and undergoes grueling training in preparation for a mysterious all-schools tournament.

episodes.title: Maneku akuma
episodes.plot: While Hakufu visits her sister, the Saito Academy fighters set sail for the tournament but soon discover a vicious rival team has invaded their boat..

episodes.title: Tamashii no kizuna
episodes.plot: Ambushed, Kanu and Ekitoku fall overboard, but their pals are captured and forced to Nanban Island. In a bathhouse, Gentuko battles rival Shimei.

episodes.title: Muragaru kiba
episodes.plot: Mouki and Kyocho escape, and Kanu is called to the fight arena by sinister mastermind Kentei. Hakufu, moved by an intense vision, rushes to Nanban.

episodes.title: Chinmoku no namida
episodes.plot: Determined to unleash Gentoku's inner dragon, Kentei launches a demonic attack on the Seito team, who now realize the tournament is a trap.

episodes.title: Saikai wa ken
episodes.plot: In the nick of time, Hakufu rejoins her team as they battle Kentei, while Kanu fights the vengeful one-eyed dragon warrior Shimei.

episodes.title: Okoru ai
episodes.plot: In a desperate search for Kanu, Mouki, Hakufu and her cousin Koukin battle their way through the heavily guarded, labyrinthine Nanban fortress.

episodes.title: Sakareta yami
episodes.plot: As Kanu and Shimei's to-the-death battle rages, Hakufu is buried in rubble while trying to protect Koukin from Kentei's fierce disciple Teni.

episodes.title: Moeru shiro
episodes.plot: After Hakufu's battered body is restored and Kentei's identity revealed, the epic conflict between the ancient warriors comes to its brutal climax.

episodes.title: Mirai mugen
episodes.plot: To celebrate their victory and safe return to Saito, the teens throw a party for Gentoku, unaware that in another part of town, a new evil lurks.

episodes.title: Hei wa kuni no daiji nari
episodes.plot: Hakufu and her crew work to raise money for a tournament where they will face fierce opponents. When her little sister shows up things get crazy.

episodes.title: Hei to wa kidô nari
episodes.plot: When a gang of thugs kidnaps her sweet little sister, Hakufu goes on a rampage. The odds are not on her side, but luckily, her friends are.

episodes.title: Shisha wa mata ikubekarazu
episodes.plot: Ryomou is shocked to stumble upon a girl everyone thought was dead, but all Hakufu can think is taking the new girl to a karaoke bar.

episodes.title: Son o mirukoto midorigo no gotoshi
episodes.plot: Mysterious necklaces that unleash their wearers' deepest desires create havoc at a martial arts shrine. Pretty ones, beware what lurks within.

episodes.title: Ayauki ni hizareba tatakawazu
episodes.plot: A day at the beach turns into a treasure hunt, but when giant man-eating sharks appear, the bikini-clad warrior babes show off their moves.

episodes.title: Jôchi o nite mamoto no masu
episodes.plot: A quest to recover lost memories lures Hakufu's crew into an ambush at an abandoned school. Amidst a flurry of flying fists, they revisit the past.

episodes.title: Hajime wa shojo no gotoku
episodes.plot: Possessed by a mysterious girl in a cape, Ryofu wreaks havoc on her new friends. He scandalous behavior with Gentoku may push Kanu over the edge.

episodes.title: Hito o itashite hito ni itasarezu
episodes.plot: Suspicious of her master's odd behavior, Kanu sends a messenger to ask Hakufu for help; Ryomou's peaceful dip in a hot spring is disrupted by Ryofu.

episodes.title: San ôki wa kachi san sukunaki wa katazu
episodes.plot: Saji and the magician who shares his name use Ryofu as the centerpiece of a heinous plot to awaken the dragon lurking within Ryomou.

episodes.title: Jôhei wa bô o utsu
episodes.plot: When Hakufu is possessed by the magician, cousin Koukin and Chuubo must make a dangerous stand to prevent her from being lost forever.

episodes.title: Mazu sono aisuru tokoro o ubau
episodes.plot: Chuubo reveals her shocking true identity, the joins forces with Koukin and Hakufu on a perilous mission to rescue Ryomou.

episodes.title: Senmarite ichi to naru
episodes.plot: Koukin and Hakufu risk their lives in the battle to save Chuubo; brawling with Ryofu, Ryomou learns a lesson of vital importance.

episodes.title: The Movements of a Newborn Dragon's Spirit
episodes.plot: Ryomou stealthily pursues the Dragon Jade while the dragon hidden within Sousou begins to stir.

episodes.title: Awakening of the Devil King
episodes.plot: Kakuka's scheming causes Sousou's dragon to awaken; Ryomou visits Seito High School.

episodes.title: Dripping Blood, Shedding Tears
episodes.plot: The awakening of Ryuubi's dragon forces Ryomou to flee; Sonsaku and the Nanyou gang at last make their first appearance.

episodes.title: Chanced Meeting Between Two Dragons
episodes.plot: The looming threat of Kyoshou lures Nanyou into the plot. During a visit to Seito to search for answers, an assassin is sent to face Ryomou.

episodes.title: Cruel Toushi
episodes.plot: Ryomou's battle comes to an unforeseen end; Sousou loses more of himself to his ancient namesake.

episodes.title: An Encounter with the Crouching Dragon
episodes.plot: Kan'u leaves Seito to judge famed strategist Koumei Shokatsuryou's worthiness, yet she is unknowingly followed by two familiar faces.

episodes.title: Kan-u's Surrender
episodes.plot: Influenced by the desires of his ancient incarnation, Sousou goes to great lengths to have Kan'u at his side once again.

episodes.title: A Minor Leader's Glorious Death
episodes.plot: Sonsaku journeys to Kyoshou alone to seek justice for Kakouen's rampage, but a surprising opponent is waiting there.

episodes.title: A Shattered Friendship
episodes.plot: Sonsaku is gone; an old comrade returns; and Kakouton pays a heavy price for following his principles.

episodes.title: The Legend of Koukin
episodes.plot: Koukin is still devastated by a loss and wanders without purpose, until a chance encounter with Seito's Kan'u reestablishes his resolve.

episodes.title: The War of Toushi
episodes.plot: Koumei Shokatsuryou's master plan comes to fruition, with Nanyou and Seito once again forming an alliance against Kyoshou and replaying the events of the Battle of Red Cliffs 1800 years later.

episodes.title: Chibi Ablaze!
episodes.plot: The final battle commences, as three dragons fight for survival and domination as they did thousands of years ago.

episodes.title: Ichi
episodes.plot: Hakufu Sonsaku joins the ranks of Nanyo Academy with her cousin Koukin. Inside her Spirit pendant is a fierce warrior who conquered the lands 1800 years ago. The Big Four of Nanyo Academy see her as a threat and wish to take her out.

episodes.title: Ni
episodes.plot: The fierce Fighter Totaku of Rakuyo High School has been conquering multiple schools in Kanto. Other schools have been banding together against him. Meanwhile, Hakufu ends up battling with Kannei and Ryomou, while Koukin fights a mass of students on his own.

episodes.title: San
episodes.plot: Hakufu defeats Ryomou through a force taking over her body, almost leading to Ryomou's death. Koukin vows to protect Hakufu so that it never happens again, but Hakufu runs away from home, only to end up in trouble.

episodes.title: Shi
episodes.plot: Taishiji is given an order to execute Hakufu.

episodes.title: Go
episodes.plot: The Great Fighter's Tournament is approaching. Totaku, the previous victor, has rigged the draw for the tournament. Hakufu goes on a rampage to avenge Taishiji and is overcome by her spirit once again.

episodes.title: Roku
episodes.plot: The new Fighters Tournament has now commenced. Which school will come out on top? Will anyone defeat Toutaku? How will Nanjou Academy go with Hakufu Sonsaku fighting for them? And will the spirit living inside her be awakened once again?

episodes.title: Shichi
episodes.plot: Hakufu and Koukin manage to fend off the crazed snake-like Kannei Kouha. Ryofu continues to pursue her own relationships with the possibility of betraying Tontaku. Shimei Ryomou fights the beautiful but deadly schoolgirl-uniformed Kanu Unchou of Seito Private School on the rooftops. Hakufu gets in another battle as well.

episodes.title: Hachi
episodes.plot: A mother-daughter rivalry rears its nasty head when Hakufu tangles with Kakouton, and the ranks of Rakuyou High School are diminished by a sudden uprising.

episodes.title: Kyuu
episodes.plot: Aunt Goei takes Hakufu and Koukin to a mountain hot springs that seems to attract some of the other female fighters including Ryoumou and Ryofu who are also hoping to recover. Hakufu catches up to Ryoumou and they spar with Hakufu's old teacher Choukou.

episodes.title: Juu
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Juuichi
episodes.plot: Chuubo reveals her shocking true identity before joining Koukin and Hakufu on a mission to rescue Ryomou!

episodes.title: Juuni
episodes.plot: Toutaku forces Hakufu to battle Ryofu, otherwise Ryoumou will be killed. The girls fight each other, but also attempt to go after Toutaku. It looks like no one will be able to win, until Ryofu defies her fate, and uses her ultimate technique. Hakufu and Ryoumou learn Saji's true identity and they go to rescue Koukin and confront Saji.

episodes.title: Juusan
episodes.plot: Hakufu and Ryoumei go after Ouin Shishi, who manages to enrage Hakufu. But instead of her dragon spirit manifesting, Hakufu channels the remaining influence of Toutaku and gets out of control. Can Koukin save her from her fate? Ukitsu also comes back for a final challenge.
